messages:
Name: Renato Ibarra
Nationality: Ecuador
Date of Birth: January 20, 1991
Position: Attacker
Current club: América
Liga MX clubs played for: América, Atlas, Tijuana

Renato Ibarra, the América attacker, has made 14 Liga MX appearances this season overall, but is yet to appear in the competition for his current club in 2022/2023. Those previous Liga MX appearances this season came at former club Tijuana.

Ibarra last played in the league on October 3 for Tijuana versus León. He scored a goal in that game for his club in their 2-2 draw. In total, he has notched two Liga MX goals in 2022/2023, and registered one assist. He has been shown a yellow card once.
A first goal of the league campaign for Ibarra came against Atlas in a 2-1 victory on July 27.
América, who are top of the table with 38 points, entertain Mazatlán on January 29 the next time the team are in Liga MX action.
Ibarra played 13 Liga MX games last season for Tijuana and created one assist.
Ibarra rejoined América in January 2023 after a loan spell at Tijuana, for whom he made 27 league appearances in total, scoring two goals and providing two assists.
